DataElement.preferredName: Needle Biopsy Prostate Gland Specimen Characteristic Tissue Sample Total Length Float mm
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Sum of all lengths of individual prostate needle biopsy cores, where length is the longest dimension of the core.

The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid ta:The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

Concepts.definition: The removal of a tissue sample using a needle, for microscopic examination.

The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

Property.preferredDefinition: definition pending:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.

Concepts.definition: A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation.
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.
